scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:frontend & npm run deploy:ecr && npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:apprunner
scripts.deploy:ecr: cd infra && terraform init && terraform apply -auto-approve -target=aws_ecr_repository.backend -target=aws_ecr_lifecycle_policy.backend -target=aws_iam_role.apprunner_ecr_access -target=aws_iam_role.apprunner_instance -target=aws_iam_role_policy_attachment.apprunner_ecr_access
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && docker build --no-cache -t app-cardapio-backend . && aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $(cd ../infra && terraform output -raw ecr_repository_url | cut -d'/' -f1) && docker tag app-cardapio-backend:latest $(cd ../infra && terraform output -raw ecr_repository_url):latest && docker push $(cd ../infra && terraform output -raw ecr_repository_url):latest
scripts.deploy:frontend: git add . && git commit -a -m 'deploy' --allow-empty && git push
scripts.gacp: git add . && git commit -m 'deploy gacp' --allow-empty && git push
